remarks: The left group action of element ` A ` of group ` G ` maps the underlying set ` X ` of ` G ` one-to-one onto itself.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-Mar-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
statement:
grplact.1 $e |- F = ( g e. X |-> ( a e. X |-> ( g .+ a ) ) ) $.
grplact.2 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
grplact.3 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grplactf1o $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( F ` A ) : X -1-1-onto-> X ) $.
$d .+ a g $.
$d A a g $.
$d G a g $.
$d X a g $.
$d a g $.
